title: Samsara
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Organic, Ayurvedic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Art gallery/cafe/tea room has a good selection of herbal and tea infusions, exotic smoothies and special hot drinks as well. Menu is mostly vegetarian, with vegan, lactose free and gluten free choices. Cooks your meal according to your diet. Has a collection of books to read while there, holds documentary nights and has relaxing music. Serves super foods, quinoa, chia, amaranth  and others.
